red.details: 4 tests failed as expected: multi-line wrapped options, path starting with ~, path continuation from terminal wrapping, multiple path continuation lines. 6 tests passed (standard multiple choice, false positives, regression, wide terminal).

green.details: Added isPathContinuation condition with /^[\/~]/.test(line) || /^[a-zA-Z0-9_\/-]+$/.test(line). All 59 prompt-detector tests pass (49 existing + 10 new).

refactor.changes: No refactoring needed per YAGNI principle. Change is minimal: 1 line added, 1 line modified, comment block updated.

test_coverage: All prompt-detector tests pass. Regression tests for auto-yes-resolver (8 tests), PromptPanel (28 tests), MobilePromptSheet (29 tests), MessageListOptimistic (23 tests) all pass. Total: 147 tests across 5 test files.
commits: 4861152: fix(prompt-detector): detect multiple choice prompts with path-wrapped options
message: TDD implementation complete for Issue #181. Added isPathContinuation condition to detect terminal line-wrapped file paths in multiple choice option text. All quality checks pass.
